Package server.universe.mob

The server.universe.mob package contains MOB, all of its subtypes, as well as BehaviorStrategy and DialogStrategy classes that MOBs use.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BehaviorStrategy A BehaviorStrategy represents a behavior that a MOB can have at any given time.
DialogStrategy A BehaviorStrategy represents a behavior that a MOB can have at any given time.
 

Class Summary
Bunny A bunny is a small, peaceful animal.
Deer Deers are similar to kittens and bunnies: not very interesting.
ICritter ICritters, like the ICritters of our previous project, delight in breeding.
ICritterCat The familiar ICritterCat, in a new world.
ICritterDog The familiar ICritterCat, in a new world.
ICritterPenguin The familiar ICritterPenguin, in a new world.
Kitten The kitten is clearly the cutest mob.
Merchant The merchant class models a MOB that can sell his items to players.
MOB The MOB class represents a mobile non-player character.
MoveBehavior  
NullBehavior  
NullDialog  
RoomGiftMob This MOB is a very generous one, in that it drops items throughout rooms.
RoomThiefMob This Mob steals from rooms.
Troll The merchant class models a MOB that can sell his items to players.
 

Package server.universe.mob Description

The server.universe.mob package contains MOB, all of its subtypes, as well as BehaviorStrategy and DialogStrategy classes that MOBs use.
